q.quote: It's simple, if it juggles, it's fat.
q.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

q.quote: There is nothing so stable as change.
q.author: Bob Dylan

q.quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
q.author: Charles Darwin

q.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
q.author: Matt Cameron

q.quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
q.author: Dr.Seuss

q.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
q.author: Reba McEntire

q.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
q.author: Mitch Hedberg

q.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
q.author: Jim Carrey

q.quote: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
q.author: Isaac Asimov

q.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
q.author: Albert Einstein

q.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
q.author: Charles R. Swindoll

q.quote: It always seems impossible, until it is done.
q.author: Nelson Mandela

q.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
q.author: Steve Jobs

q.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure
q.author: Colin Powell

q.quote: I can resist everything except temptation
q.author: Oscar Wilde
